3321.『アストルティア放送局の設定』の 説明です。|<br>|アストルティア放送局は:
This will explain "Astoltia Broadcast Station|Settings".|
|The Astoltia Broadcast station allows you to|watch programs related to Dragon Quest X|right from inside the game.|
|Programs such as Super Dragon X TV and Dragon|Quest Information Program will be broadcast,|mainly from Nico Nico Live Broadcasting.|
|The "Watch" option will dictate whether or|not you will see the broadcast. If it's off,|the video will not play.|
|Turning off "Watch" will also disable other|options, so please be aware of this.|
|If "Watch" is set to on, but you can't see the|broadcast, please make sure the requirements|are met.|
|Depending on your system, if you are close to|the broadcast monitor, your gameplay quality|may suffer and become unplayable.|
|If this happens, you can set Watch to "Off"|in the login menu.|
|If you have your Status Icon set to|"Streaming", you will not be able to watch|the broadcast.|
|Turning on "View Comments" will allow you|to view comments that others post during|the broadcast.|
|If comments are displayed, any comments that|meet the criteria of Nico Nico Douga will|be displayed.|
|With "Send Comments", you can set whether or|not to use the "Nearby Broadcast" chat mode|to send broadcast comments.|
|If "Nearby Broadcast" is set, your chat will be|sent to Nico Nico Douga as comments. Please|be mindful of what you say.|
|"Monitor Quality" allows you to choose the|quality of the broadcast screen. Please|choose based on your environment and liking.|
|Please note that any changes will be reflected|once you close the menu and the video reloads.|
|"Monitor Volume" allows you to set the volume|of the broadcast.|
|Please check the Adventurer's Square for the|Astoltia Broadcasting Station.|
|Player Only Site|Dragon Quest X Awakening Adventurer's Square|https://hiroba.dqx.jp|
|Use good manners and enjoy the broadcast!
